about_the_game:
(Project ARC now has its official name, PUBG: Blindspot)

"Welcome to the Steam Next Fest demo of PUBG: Blindspot!
Get ready to dive into the action-packed gameplay of PUBG: Blindspot, brought to you by the ARC Team at PUBG Studios. This is your exclusive chance to experience what we've been cooking up so far!"

"What's in the demo?
10 unique characters with their own signature weapons and special tools
3 intense team deathmatch maps
4 demolition mission maps, each with its own epic theme"

Experience fast-paced military gunplay, tactical CQB teamwork, and unique characters with gadgets that define the PUBG: Blindspot experience.

"About the game:
PUBG: Blindspot is a 5v5 team-based PvP top-down shooter that blends strategy and action like never before."

"Want more info? Head to the official store page!
Don't miss out—Wishlist now!"

content_descriptors.notes: The game includes blood effects when characters are shot.

(Project ARC now has its official name, PUBG: Blindspot)

"Welcome to the Steam Next Fest demo of PUBG: Blindspot!
Get ready to dive into the action-packed gameplay of PUBG: Blindspot, brought to you by the ARC Team at PUBG Studios. This is your exclusive chance to experience what we've been cooking up so far!"

"What's in the demo?

Experience fast-paced military gunplay, tactical CQB teamwork, and unique characters with gadgets that define the PUBG: Blindspot experience.

name: PUBG: BLINDSPOT Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: TBD

  • Memory: TBD MB RAM
  • Graphics: TBD

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews:
“It's a top-down shooter—a marriage of genre and camera angle that you rarely see outside SWAT tactics games—with some mechanical crunch.”
PC Gamer

“Overall, Project ARC is bursting with potential. Even in an early build, the title is quite polished—and it has the ingredients key to not only a big player presence but a role in the esports world.”
Game Rant

“Even with the limited time we got to spend playing the game, there’s one thing we could all seemingly agree on — the game is fun as hell.”
VICE
short_description: PUBG: BLINDSPOT is a dynamic 5v5 military shooting game, presenting a realistic and fast-paced gunplay like never before in a top-down shooting game. Use real-time shared vision with teammates and a variety of tools to create and execute creative team strategies.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Vietnamese, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil, Polish, Korean
